Advanced Alchemy.name: Продвинутая Алхимия
Advanced Alchemy.description:
Требуется: Продвинутые Преимущества в @UUID[Compendium.projectfu.skills.Item.SsR6UJXT65Q1qNO2]{Гаджеты - Алхимия}

За 4 Очка Инвентаря, бросьте три d20 и назначьте один результат для цели, а другой для эффекта.

Basic Alchemy.name: Базовая Алхимия
Basic Alchemy.description:
Требуется: Базовые Преимущества в @UUID[Compendium.projectfu.skills.Item.SsR6UJXT65Q1qNO2]{Гаджеты - Алхимия}

За 3 Очка Инвентаря, бросьте два d20 и назначьте один результат для цели, а другой для эффекта.

Elemental Shard.name: Элементальный Осколок
Elemental Shard.description:
For 2 Inventory Points, one creature suffers 10 damage of a type of your choice (air, bolt, earth, fire, or ice).

  • Target Suffers: @DMG[10 air], @DMG[10 bolt], @DMG[10 earth], @DMG[10 fire], or @DMG[10 ice]
Elemental Shard.summary: One creature suffers 10 damage of a type of your choice (10 Air, 10 Bolt, 10 Earth, 10 Fire, or 10 Ice).

Elixir.name: Эликсир
Elixir.description: For 3 Inventory Points, one creature recovers @HEAL[50 mp].

Infusion: Advanced.name: Отвар: Продвинутый
Infusion: Advanced.description:
Требуется: Продвинутые Преимущества в @UUID[Compendium.projectfu.skills.Item.1tfYFkiXLuTOUmre]{Гаджеты - Отвары}

For 2 Inventory Points, the attack deals 5 extra damage, and its damage becomes: air, light, earth, or dark.
Infusion: Advanced.summary: For 2 IP the attack deals 5 extra damage, and its damage becomes: air, light, earth, OR dark.

Infusion: Basic.name: Отвар: Базовый
Infusion: Basic.description:
Требуется: Basic Benefits in @UUID[Compendium.projectfu.skills.Item.1tfYFkiXLuTOUmre]{Гаджеты - Отвары}

For 2 Inventory Points, the attack deals 5 extra damage, and its damage becomes: ice, fire, or bolt.
Infusion: Basic.summary: For 2 IP, the attack deals 5 extra damage, and its damage becomes: ice, fire, or bolt.

Infusion: Vampire (Superior).name: Отвар: Вампирский (Превосходный)
Infusion: Vampire (Superior).description:
Требуется: Superior Benefits in @UUID[Compendium.projectfu.skills.Item.1tfYFkiXLuTOUmre]{Гаджеты - Отвары}

For 2 Inventory Points, choose one option: you recover an amount of HP equal to half the HP loss suffered by the target of the attack; or you recover an amount of MP equal to half the HP loss suffered by the target of the attack.

This infusion can only be used if the attack targeted a single creature.

Infusion: Venom (Superior).name: Отвар: Отравленный (Превосходный)
Infusion: Venom (Superior).description:
Требуется: Superior Benefits in @UUID[Compendium.projectfu.skills.Item.1tfYFkiXLuTOUmre]{Гаджеты - Отвары}

For 2 Inventory Points, the attack deals 5 extra damage, its damage becomes poison, and each creature hit by the attack suffers poisoned.

Magic Tent.name: Волшебный Шатёр
Magic Tent.description: For 4 Inventory Points, this allows the entire group to rest in the wilderness and at sea.
Magic Tent.summary: This allows the entire group to rest in the wilderness and at sea.

Magicannon (Air).name: Магипушка (Воздух)
Magicannon (Air).summary: A magitech firearm that deals air damage.

Magicannon (Bolt).name: Магипушка (Молния)
Magicannon (Bolt).summary: A magitech firearm that deals bolt damage.

Magicannon (Earth).name: Магипушка (Земля)
Magicannon (Earth).summary: A magitech firearm that deals earth damage.

Magicannon (Fire).name: Магипушка (Огонь)
Magicannon (Fire).summary: A magitech firearm that deals fire damage.

Magicannon (Ice).name: Магипушка (Лёд)
Magicannon (Ice).summary: A magitech firearm that deals ice damage.

Magicannon (Item).name: Магипушка (Предмет)
Magicannon (Item).description:
Требуется: Продвинутые Преимущества в @UUID[Compendium.projectfu.skills.Item.EmwWSYlFjlUSGPLL]{Гаджеты - Магитех}

For @LOSS[3 ip] creates a firearm that deals air, bolt, earth, fire, ice, OR physical damage. Drag and drop the one you create onto your character sheet.

@UUID[Compendium.projectfu.consumables.Item.EGvZsEWEhaTqoCgG]{Magicannon (Air)}

@UUID[Compendium.projectfu.consumables.Item.uuKKqm81klCOiDjO]{Magicannon (Bolt)}

@UUID[Compendium.projectfu.consumables.Item.sREYRTy6TfK8fe53]{Magicannon (Earth)}

@UUID[Compendium.projectfu.consumables.Item.jHbcjw8RW9Ywesyu]{Magicannon (Fire)}

@UUID[Compendium.projectfu.consumables.Item.eVOnHgRLTnL695cP]{Magicannon (Ice)}

@UUID[Compendium.projectfu.consumables.Item.MJoIwfTvo0FHcDqL]{Magicannon (Physical)}
Magicannon (Item).summary: Create a firearm that deals air, bolt, earth, fire, ice, or physical.

Magicannon (Physical).name: Магипушка (Физический)
Magicannon (Physical).summary: A magitech firearm that deals physical damage.

Magisphere (Superior).name: Магисфера (Превосходный)
Magisphere (Superior).description:
Required: Superior Benefits in @UUID[Compendium.projectfu.skills.Item.EmwWSYlFjlUSGPLL]{Гаджеты - Магитех}

For 2 Inventory Points, create and use one of your magisphere prototypes, replicating the effects of a spell.

Remedy.name: Лекарство
Remedy.description: For 3 Inventory Points, one creature recovers @HEAL[50 hp].

Superior Alchemy.name: Превосходная Алхимия
Superior Alchemy.description:
Требуется: Превосходные Преимущества в @UUID[Compendium.projectfu.skills.Item.SsR6UJXT65Q1qNO2]{Гаджеты - Алхимия}

За 5 Очков Инвентаря, бросьте четыре d20 и назначьте один результат для цели, а другой для эффекта.

Tonic.name: Тоник
Tonic.description: For 2 Inventory Points, one creature recovers from a single status effect.
Tonic.summary: One creature recovers from a single status effect.
